verses.roman:
eta bali' phala phele prācīra laṅghiyā
aiche pavitra prema-sevā jagat jiniyā

synonyms: eta bali'-saying this; phala phele—throws away the fruits; prācīra laṅghiyā—across the boundary wall; aiche—such; pavitra—pure; prema-sevā—service in love; jagat jiniyā—conquering all the world.
translation: "Such was the service of Rāghava Paṇḍita. He did not accept the coconuts but threw them over the wall. His service is purely based on unalloyed love, and it conquers the whole world.
